question_text: Which of the following is TRUE about manually configuring a static IP on a device?
answer_options: You must ensure all values are accurate
You can skip entering a gateway address
You only need to enter the DNS server
The IP will still be dynamically reassigned
correct_answer: You must ensure all values are accurate
explanation: Incorrect entries in static configuration (e.g., subnet or gateway) may prevent the device from connecting properly.
